line.comment: * Herobetty 5.4: Bailing a ship will award the bounty and ascension progress.
* From !ship.signal.killed: did a player's mercenary group cause the bail? If yes, set the $playerMercKill flag to [TRUE].
* Note: unlike the bounty logic in !ship.signal.killed, freighters in ZH never bail via combat. As such, no need to set the bounty of the attacker.
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon=28 timeout=0 fadeout=0
* If he doesn't bail when he has the occasion to do it once, he'll never bail.

sval.val: Herobetty 5.4: Bailing a ship will award the bounty and ascension progress.
From !ship.signal.killed: did a player's mercenary group cause the bail? If yes, set the $playerMercKill flag to [TRUE].
Note: unlike the bounty logic in !ship.signal.killed, freighters in ZH never bail via combat. As such, no need to set the bounty of the attacker.
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox' : text=$t icon=28 timeout=0 fadeout=0
If he doesn't bail when he has the occasion to do it once, he'll never bail.
